txt.en: Rothog asked you to <rgb=#00FF00>point</rgb> at specific Orc spy-masters on the high ground to tell Húrshauk who to attack.
'Together you and Húrshauk have disrupted our opponent's battle plan! Well done, [placeholder]!\n\n'Victory cannot be far away now!'
Rothog asked you to <rgb=#00FF00>point</rgb> at specific Orcs on the high ground to tell Húrshauk who to attack.
<rgb=#00FF00>Point</rgb> at Krazlak, the Orc-spymaster on the high ground above the western bank of the river
Rothog fights in the centre of the river during the Dagor Carlanthir.
Wait for Húrshauk to attack the target you indicated
<rgb=#00FF00>Point</rgb> at Gadrúth, the Orc-spymaster on the high ground above the eastern bank of the river
Wait for Húrshauk to attack the target you indicated
Talk to Rothog during the Dagor Carlanthir
Rothog fights ferociously during the Dagor Carlanthir.

'Have you yet broken a sweat? I am instructing these Orcs in the folly of facing the Kindred of the Coins and their allies!\n\n'Húrshauk hungers for direction, [placeholder]! There are spy-masters working for the Orcs, and they call out battle plans from the high ground to the south, beyond where stands the Wizard. Find these Orc spy-masters and <rgb=#00FF00>point</rgb> them out to Húrshauk so he can disrupt their plans!'

'Húrshauk hungers for direction, [placeholder]! There are spy-masters working for the Orcs, and they call out battle plans from the high ground to the south, beyond where stands the Wizard. Find these Orc spy-masters and <rgb=#00FF00>point</rgb> them out to Húrshauk so he can disrupt their plans!'
Desperate Battle: Rothog of Dahâl Huliz
